quest.name: Golden Rain
journal:
This beggarly bloke seems to want for an ear to listen to his woes.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

The beggarly bloke jumps at the chance to start up a conversation, promptly regaling you with tiresome tales of his financial woes. Just as you reach for your coinpurse to toss him a gil and move on, he mentions that the Gold Saucer is currently hosting the Make It Rain campaign, an annual festival where guests have the chance to win magnificent prizes galore. Interest piqued, you make your way to the Ruby Road Exchange to find out more from the Saucer attendant.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

The Saucer attendant has barely begun her explanation of the festivities when she is interrupted by none other than the Saucer's esteemed owner, Godbert Manderville. Greeting you with all the flair one would expect from a Manderville man, he offers you a limited-edition VIP card bearing the stamp of House Manderville. His duty done, Godbert returns to the Saucer and the attendant instructs you to present your card to Ollier in Wonder Square.

You show your VIP card to an enthusiastic Ollier, who informs you of the myriad of spectacular prizes now within your reach─should the Spinner smile upon you, of course. With clouds of untold riches billowing on the horizon, you stride confidently into the Saucer, knowing that the time has come to make it rain.
objectives: Present the stamped Gold Saucer VIP card to Ollier.

dialogue.name: LOSER02424
dialogue.text: A gil for your thoughts, madamsir─oh, what am I saying!? Ever since I was forced to close my armor shop, gil's been harder to come by than an honest member of the Mirage Trust. Whatever is a penniless pauper like myself to do!?

dialogue.name: LOSER02424
dialogue.text: I'm not asking for boundless riches here! If only I had a few gil, I could head to the Gold Saucer and reclaim all that I've lost. They say it's as if MGP is raining down from the heavens these days!

dialogue.name: LOSER02424
dialogue.text: Mind you, if you're as well-to-do as you appear, you should really speak to the attendant come to the Ruby Road Exchange to promote the festivities. I'm sure she'll be much more keen to help those who are less...destitute.

dialogue.name: LOSER02424
dialogue.text: What's with that puzzled look? Don't tell me you've never been to the Gold Saucer! If that's the case, go and speak to that well-heeled youth over yonder─the one that looks like a foppish dandy of sorts. He'll furnish you with a ticket. Sadly for me, that's where his generosity ends.

dialogue.name: GSFESSTAFF
dialogue.text: Interested in visiting the Gold Saucer? Why, you could not have picked a better time! We are currently in the midst of our annual festival, where our honored guests can look forward to basking in a veritable downpour of spectacular prizes!

dialogue.name: GSFESSTAFF
dialogue.text: You say this will be your first trip to the Saucer? All the more reason for you to make the journey and see all the wonders our establishment has to offer!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the quest “It Could Happen to You,” which can be undertaken at level 15.

dialogue.name: GSFESSTAFF
dialogue.text: That's why we have dubbed the festivities the Make It Rain campaign. But it's not just about the prizes, oh no! You can also look forward to─

dialogue.name: GODBERT
dialogue.text: Well, if it isn't Forename from Thanalan! The way you lifted your legs and put up your hands, you were the very image of a Manderville man! Tell me, have you had a chance to partake in the festivities at my darling Gold Saucer?

dialogue.name: GODBERT
dialogue.text: Oho, look who we have here! My muscles have not forgotten the tender touch of those soothing fingers. Why, if we were not both otherwise occupied, I would ask you to crack open a fine bottle of salamander oil and get to work once more! Hahaha. Now tell me, have you had the chance to partake in the festivities at my darling Gold Saucer?

dialogue.name: GODBERT
dialogue.text: Oho, what have we here? Another adventurer come to make their dreams come true in my hall of wonders? I am Godbert Manderville, proprietor of the Saucer, to which I most heartily welcome you. Mayhap you have already partaken in the festivities?

dialogue.name: GODBERT
dialogue.text: I can personally assure you that Manderville & Manderville has spared no expense in procuring a selection of prizes that is sure to tantalize and titillate fortune seekers of all stripes.

dialogue.name: GODBERT
dialogue.text: Fortune may rule in the halls of my Gold Saucer, but it was by no mere chance that our paths crossed today. And that is why I would present you with a gift befitting this most momentous occasion!

dialogue.name: GODBERT
dialogue.text: Use it, and use it well. And with that, I must be off─countless guests are waiting for the firm handshake and stimulating discourse that only a Manderville man can deliver!

dialogue.name: GSFESSTAFF
dialogue.text: Well, I do believe Lord Manderville said it all! Once you arrive at the Gold Saucer, seek out my fellow attendant Ollier in Wonder Square. Simply present to him your VIP card, and he will see to it that you are well looked after.

dialogue.name: LOSER02424
dialogue.text: Oh, don't worry yourself on my account. I'll just be standing here, penniless and half-starved, taking the smallest of solace in the knowledge that at least some complete stranger is out there making herhis dreams come true.

dialogue.name: LOSER02424
dialogue.text: If you've never been to the Gold Saucer before, try speaking with that well-heeled youth over yonder─the foppish dandy who's wearing that shite-eating grin. I'm sure he'll furnish you with a ticket. If only gil were as easy to come by...

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Dearest adventurer, allow me to extend a most heartfelt and sincere welcome to the Gold Saucer! I trust you are finding the festivities to your liking? Whatever you have experienced thus far, let me assure you that the wonders have only begun.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Why, is that what I think it is? A VIP card, and one personally stamped by Lord Manderville himself, no less!? It would be my absolute pleasure to redeem that on your behalf, madamsir.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Ah, seeing that signet always inspires me to redouble my efforts on behalf of our distinguished guests. But pray forgive me─I have strayed quite far from the topic at hand. I am pleased to announce that the services of our campaign attendant─and a host of spectacular prizes─are now at your disposal.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Now, I daresay I've delayed you long enough. Enjoy the festivities, and may the Spinner guide you to fortunes beyond your wildest dreams!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can now purchase seasonal items from the campaign attendant. Please note that you will be unable to do so after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

dialogue.name: GSFESSTAFF
dialogue.text: Once you arrive at the Gold Saucer, seek out my fellow attendant Ollier in Wonder Square. Simply present to him the card you received from Lord Manderville, and he will see to it that you are well attended to.
